choices: Medeival Fantasy World (e.g. Lord of the Rings, A Song of Ice and Fire)
Mixture of Magic and the Real World (e.g. Incarnations of Immortality)
Fantasy World hidden from the Real World (e.g. Narnia, Harry Potter)
11.title: Fantasy

1111.content: Now that you've served 15 years in the Imperial Army you've decided that it is time to retire and find a less dangerous line of work. You had been successful, serving as the Senior Liostail in an infiltration unit, but the life was hard, and you remembered why you originally joined, you wanted to earn the status of a free man. Being a free man wouldn't matter if you were dead so left after your first re-enlistment you left. Now you're looking for a job. Something better than the farm labor you left behind you. You've started your search in Bruite, ironically one of the cities your infiltration team helped take. In the marketplace you see a variety of places hiring.
1111.title: Veteran of the Imperial Army

11111.content:
You enter the Mages' Order. The entrance is rather bland, just stone walls to your left and right and in front of you is a woman sitting behind a desk.

She looks at you and says, "State your business."

"I'm here for a job," you respond.

"Go down the hall to my right, and enter the last room on the left." She points down the hall. Once you to the room, you knock.

"Come in." You hear a voice say. "and state your business."

You enter and respond, "I'm here for a job."

"What experience do you have."

"15 years in the Imperial Army, 12 as an Infiltrator, and of those 8 as a Liostal."

"Before that?"

"None, I was a peasant."

"I have a couple of assignments for one of your skill-set."
11111.title: Mage's Guild

choices: Divine Magic, given by some sort of diety
Arcane Magic, manipulating the natural forces of magic
1112.title: Magic User

choices: Sarnai, The young female shaman of a nomadic tribe.
Theotiste, A male witch-doctor living outside of a large city.
11123.title: Spirit Magic, controlling spirits

choices: I decide to woo the lady who saved me.
I leave the warehouse under my own power.
114.content:
Once upon a time in a Non Medieval Fantasy World circa November 1998 in Baths England, I was a yellow animated robot cat who accidentally ended up being encased in a bird bath statue until a lovely pink animated robot cat heard my muffled cries for help and immediately came to my rescue.

"It's time for drastic measures." She said.

Soon enough, she drove a forklift with what appeared to be canned fish and other kinds of cat food that we cats love to eat towards me.

"This could get messy." She said.

After wards, she opened up one of the cans as I began smelling the scent of tasty canned fish which was not only quite mesmerizing but it also made my stomach rumble as I quickly broke out of the statue and went straight for all that canned fish and whatnot as she got out of the way while I began chowing down and not only started gaining weight like no tomorrow, but I also grew to a gigantic size after having finished all of that food off as I let out a normal sounding burp or belch.

Now what will I do next?
114.title: Non-Medieval Fantasy World

choices: Physical Training (e.g. Green Arrow, Black Widow, Batman)
Equipment (e.g. Iron Man, Ant Man, Vixen)
13.content: How do you get your powers?
13.title: Superhero

choices: You were the original subject but it was an unexpected result.
It was the goal of the experiment.
You weren't supposed to be the subject.
131.title: Experiment (e.g. Hulk, Captain America)

choices: girl?" Your boyfriend and fellow test subject asked
1312.content:
You and your partner Allison Crona have been studying the possibility of improving the human body. The basis for the idea came from all the comics and other media that had people transformed into superheroes. After enlisting in the research ward in the military you and Alison worked on the project that would create the world's first super-powered task force. Tonight was finally the night. You along with a few other people were going to undergo the experiment. Your friend, Allison, was going to activate the Nucleus, a machine that contains a mix of various ions that activates the transformation.

"Ready partner?" Your partner asked.

"I'm ready!" You replied.

Allison then pushes the button on the touchscreen computer. After the button was pushed the Nucleus began charging. Within the next minute the Nucleus fires a beam at you and your fellow test subjects. The atomic blast enveloped your body. You could feel your muscles tensing and aching in an almost unbearable pain. You then pass out. You faintly hear your friend's voice calling your name. The project was over, but the blast from the Nucleus knocked you and the other test subjects out like a light. A few hours later you wake up in the infirmary. Nothing felt weird or different, but you were certain that you were somehow changed. You then hear a familiar voice call out to you.

"Glad your awake. How are you feeling...
1312.title: It was the goal of the experiment.

choices: You fall but you fell no pain
13121.content:
"Glad your awake. How are you feeling dude?" your friend asked.

"I'm fine Allison, you replied. That blast from the Nucleus was intense."

"I know. I was worried that you and the others might have been killed. Thankfully you're alive and well. You're the kindest man that I know!"

A strange tension fills the air and not relating to the experiment. Could Allison be in love with you? You notice her eyes begin tearing up.

"Are you ok Ally?"

"Oh! I'm fine. I'm just relieved to see that you're safe. We need to gather the others and see what type of changes the Nucleus bestowed upon them. According to our research the changes could be nuclear, biological, quantum, chemical, or anything else."

"That's right. Despite firing ions various components were added in. So all the results wouldn't be the same. Huh?"

"What is it?"

"Is it me or do you think that someone may try to steal our invention?"

"What are you talking about? Don't be... Could the Nucleus have given you psychic powers?"

"Allison this is no time to joke around! I just have a bad feeling!"

Could she be right? I have to find that out later. I just remember how Colonel Logan was anxious to put together the task force. What could have in store for this task force other than win wars?

You remembered from all the superhero comics that there's always a villain that wanted absolute power for themselves. You just felt that somehow something could go wrong. As you run out the door you trip over your own feet. To your surprise...
13121.title: dude?" your friend asked

131211.content: You levitate and have the powers of a ghost.
131211.title: You levitate in place

1313.title: You weren't supposed to be the subject.

choices: Take him up on his offer
1313311.content:
Your physics class is taking a trip to a laboratory that works to apply discoveries in Particle and Quantum physics to the real world. A lot of the people in your class are excited, but you just want to get it over with. You don't have any problems with physics but particle and quantum physics both seem too metaphysical. Before you all head inside the director of the lab gives you a safety brief. It was all normal stuff so you took the chance to go on your phone.

Once he is done, you all head inside. They have a variety of interesting inventions, but most either are too costly or too unsafe to go into production. Once he has completed a short tour he releases you to look around the labs, reminding you to follow his earlier directions.

You head off by yourself, trying to see if there is anything in here that might interest you. You miss a danger sign and look into a large empty room. It is very dark so you pull what looks to be the light switch. You are suddenly blinded by an intense amount of light as you lose consciousness.

Later that day you wake up in a hospital bed with the director of the lab by your side.

"Are you alright?" He asks.

"Yeah. What happened?" You ask.

"Well that room was designed to observe the effects of different particles on a variety of objects. We had found a way to store anti-dark matter and were going to study its effect on a variety of objects. That switch was the way to release them from the inside. We have no idea what the effects of that might have been, as such we would like to invite you to come to our lab so we can help you and vice versa."
1313311.title: Carolyn, a female college student

13133111.content:
"I would really appreciate that sir."

"Of course. I would be more than happy to help you, and you don't need to call me sir. My name is Bertrand." He responds. "Can you walk."

"I'll try." You get up, finding it surprisingly easy. "Do the doctors need me or can we head straight to your lab." You ask.

"We can go, I'm a qualified doctor."

You start to walk out of the room.

"Watch out for the bed!" He yells. "What?"

You see a sudden look of confusion on his face. Then you look down and realize you are walking through the bed.

"I, I don't know..." You respond.

"We need to get to the lab ASAP." He gets up and starts walking. "Let's go."
13133111.title: Take him up on his offer

132.title: Physical Training (e.g. Green Arrow, Black Wido...

134.title: Equipment (e.g. Iron Man, Ant Man, Vixen)

choices: Work as a Freelance Mercenary in Africa
Support People's Movements in the Middle East
134123.content:
After a full year of work you've finished your armor. Drawing inspiration from Iron Man you thought of a way to distinguish yourself from other PMC's. Now it's ready. Its made of a Kevlar like fabric laced with Vibranium you were paid with by the Black Panther for hunting down Jedediah Klaw. It has a mechanical system to swing out the weapon you need, either your sniper rifle, assault rifle, pistol, shotgun, or tranquilizer gun. Combined with your incredible fitness and marksmanship, this suit will make you the fiercest mercenary short of Deadpool.

What will you do?
134123.title: Anti Hero

13422.content: What do your powers deal with?
13422.title: Female

1342211.content: What type of character are you?
1342211.title: DC

choices: He decides you aren't paying him enough.
13422112.content:
Having heard of a powerful amulet I funded a team of archaeologists to investigate the ruins of a temple buried under the island of Lesbos. They will return tomorrow, and I will be hosting a dinner to celebrate the final touch on your collection of Ancient Greek and Roman artifacts. It will be a great night as I've invited all of Seattle's top political, social, and business leaders.

*Ring*Ring*Ring*

"This is Venera Mars." I answer.

"Miss Mars, this is Jonathon from Starling Catering. We have had a series of issues and will not be able to fill your order for tomorrow."

"You will fill my order, we had a contract."

"I'm sorry ma'am, we don't have the supplies."

"Let me speak to the owner." I order firmly.

"Um... he normally doesn't deal directly to customers."

"I told you to let me speak to the owner."

"Yes, ma'am." I always get what I want. "Here you go."

"May I ask who I'm speaking to?"

"This is Venera Mars."

"Miss Mars, I'm very sorry for whatever inconvenience my manager may have caused you, we will be sure to get the horderves to your social, and if you want I can fire Johnson." The owner at least recognizes me.

"No, don't worry about that, in fact I'd like him to personally oversee the service at the social."

"Of course, I do hope you will continue to come to us for catering."

"I'll consider it. Goodbye." That was remarkably easy to solve.

Nothing else comes and you go to bed. In the morning Slade Wilson arrives with the artifacts.
13422112.title: Villian

135.content: How do you get your powers?
135.title: Other

choices: Parents had superpowers, so I would call myself a mutant
I was mutated through a different means
1351.content: So you're a mutant. What was the cause of your mutation? Is it genetic due to a gene? Did any of your parents get superpowers through any means besides birth and by being born sometime after your parents got their powers was your genetic makeup now considered a mutatation? Or did your mutation result from something else that no scientist or specialist on superpowers has discovered yet.
1351.title: Mutation (e.g. Wolverine, Jean Grey)

choices: In  Middle school or High School
13511.content:
Reports from around the world have been raving about an outbreak among teens and adults. People claim to have boys phase through walls, girls lifting cars, people wearing strange costumes to either fight or commit crime. Everyone is in a frenzy ad the so called Mutagenic Plague has swept across the world in such a sudden way.

Researchers are trying to examine teens and adults to find out whether or not this "plague" is genetic and if it has any ill effects on health. One leading professor from the Institute of American Higher Learning has expressed her theory on the events. Professor Cheryl Magnolia is stating that the Revolutionaries, aka mutants, have what she calls an M-gene.

The M-Gene is said to activate when people are teenagers and adults, especially young adults. People with the M-gene go through a metamorphosis. This usually occurs during or after puberty and people who go through the change may look the same or look completely different. The powers that Revolutionaries have mainly depend on their hobbies and personalities or it may be random.

No one knows if that is the case. It was the middle of summer when the news of the "plague" came. You were currently...
13511.title: The M-Gene

13512.content: Which one of your parents had superpowers? According to the Mutation Theorem most mutations are passed on from parents to their offspring. A carrier's genetic code is prone to inheriting any changes that occurred later in their parents' lives. So did one or both parents have superpowers?
13512.title: Mutant via Parents

135122.content: Upon discovering your powers upon puberty your mom and dad decided it was time for the talk. To your surprise your parents were literally superheroes. On nights where grandma and grandpa would watch over you your parents fought against notorious supervillians. What powers you have and what superhero aliases your parents go by are a complete mystery to you. When your parents came to you, you were a...
135122.title: Both, actually

1353.content: How else did you get your powers?
1353.title: Other

135311.content: So your a hero? Are you a man or a woman?
135311.title: Hero

choices: Born with them or develop sometime after birth
1353111.content: So you're a man. How do your superpowers activate?
1353111.title: Man

choices: Your appearance hasn't changed, but you feel your new powers within you.
Your appearance has changed and how does this affect your powers?
13531111.content:
You are Zavalon Nebulaire. You come from a long long of humanoid aliens known as the Synthumans. Upon birth your species resembles humans, the species who dwell on the planet that your kind now coexists with. The year is 2300. In the year 2116 after the destruction of your species original homeworld, the Synthumian space staion Cosmoya, your kind was forced to find another home world until a new one could be rebuilt. According to your race's history your race were just several nomadic clans that traveled the cosmos. It was during the Cosmic Wars that the tribes united together. In the year 700 they built an organic space station that could support your kind. The planet was made out of an organic metal with unique properties. Once the space station grew to maturity your kind brought the Fluxvolvian Stones, the catalyst that triggers your kinds transformation.

The transformation usually bestows unimaginable power, but sometimes an individual's physical appearance undergoes a minor or drastic change. Before any of your kind can use the Fluxvolvian stones their are a few requirements that the Counsel has in place. All Synthumans must know the knowledge and lore of your race. They must also sign up for the military draft or be part of the military, even if it's in non-combative roles. Finally, Synthumans must never abuse their powers. This has helped the government of your race keep everything in order despite some criminals who illegally go through Flux. During Flux the individual in wrapped in an orb of light. After Flux the orb vanishes and the individual comes out changed.

Since your kind inhabited Earth they were amazed at what they discovered. People of Earth had developed powers similar to your kind, but through various means. The WU has dubbed such people as Revolutionaries since most of them required experimentation or were just freak accidents. You were currently residing in the Gravlock base in Odessa, Texas. You were part of a global Synthumanian military unit called Galacton. As part of Galacton you and other Sythumians would fight rogue Revolutionaries or Sythumans who posed a major threat to your home. You have yet to go through Flux, yet going through Flux was voluntary when all the requirements were met and also due to Sythumian military scientists having to grow the stones in the labs scattered across the planet.

Build wise you stood at 6'8" and were stocky in stature. Your stocky frame boated of well-developed muscles. All in all you were average height for your race, but compared to humans your a tall guy. Your you had a fair complexion and bright teal eyes and black hair. Yet both pre-Flux and post-Flux after flux your race came in many skin tones, except that pre-Flux skin tones were the same as humans while post-Flux can stay the same or drastically change. You were currently with your fellow Sythumans as the director of your faction was going over the mission.

"Listen up troops. World United has recently reported that the League of Corruption has been recruiting more members. We located their base in Skarnum. We will be sending several teams to take out their base. The only problem is that men and women who have gone throughFlux will be enough. If you want to go through Flux now is your chance, however slots are limited so it's a first come first serve basis." The director said as a table came up right out of the floor next to where she was standing.

Your director, Starna Warpoon was a Synthuman who has already gone through Flux. Her appearance was always the same even after Flux. She had the power of magnetism and could turn anything she touches into a magnet if she so chooses. Her naturally beautiful blonde hair and silver eyes were full of determination. Her complexion was a natural tan and she was the same height yet not as buff as you. You secretly harbored a crush for the director since you were the same age. Out of all Synthumans you were one of the few to achieve a high rank despite not having powers yet. It was after this speech you decided that you were ready to go through Flux. Luckily for you, you were the first in line, After signing up on the tablet that was on the table you take your seat.

An hour later half the room had signed on to go through Flux if they haven't been through it already. The director then resumes to speak.

"I appreciate your dedication. Tomorrow report to the Training Room for Flux."

Satisfied you head back to your quarters. The next morning you and several other Synthumans gather in the grand hall that leads to the Training Room. Since you were first you were guided into the Training Room. The Training Room was where you would often train to take down the enemy. Before you is a table with a Fluxvolvian Stone. To perform the transformation you had to put it over your heart. You then proceed to the table and do just that. Then you are engulfed in an orb of light. After a few minutes the orb fades away. You then look in the mirror and see...
13531111.title: Catalyst

choices: A mix of all three or other

The question is are you a human with strange powers, some sort of fantasy creature, or are you something or someone from a strange magical realm who must keep all the crazy things from your world from leaking into the not so magical earth?

15112.title: I'm not human. How did you know?

info.brief_description: SciFi, Fantasy, and other stories where you must combat huge odds to protect your world.
info.description:
This story is a adventure where you have a task you must accomplish to stop the powerful forces arrayed against you, beyond that it's up to you.


Rules:
Decent length chapters (Unless a choice is absolutely necessary)
No Toilet Play
No Pedophilia
